Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot, Quickstride
Location: Deep Earth caverns not far from the Black Fortress

Quickstride, Talon, Perceptor, Straightshot and Legacy all secure
themselves inside the front portion of Tuscon, and then Tuscon floored
it! Meanwhile stones and rocks of varying sizes began to fall. First
it was grains of sand, then pebbles and then larger and larger pieces.
Tuscon continued to push forward, using his great size and agility to
move around what he could and to bull his way through what he
couldn't!

For the first few minutes it seemed as if a mountain was going to fall
on top of Tuscon and those along with him. After they had traveled
several miles the only trembling got worse and worse, as the walls and
floor continued to shake and even split in spots.

>>CRASH!!!<<

Tons of rock fell behind Tuscon, perhaps a mile or so back, falling
between them and the area where the battle had taken place, making
that area totally impassable.

However the area ahead was calm as they trembling stopped. A billowing
cloud of dust came flowing up the tunnel from where the rock had fell,
but so far nothing dangerous was showing itself.

Ahead sensors could not detect any sign of Rodimus, however there was
also no other breaks or branches breaking off from their path. There
was only one direction Rodimus and his abductor could have gone -
Straight ahead.

The air is in the tunnel was getting decidedly cooler as the group
traveled, and up ahead Perceptor could catch a slight scent of
something mechanical. What ever it was out of range of sensors, but it
was up ahead and they were steadily approaching it!

(TAG)

Preston
